thread.title: Dayton book sale set for this weekend
thread.title_full: Dayton book sale set for this weekend

title: Dayton book sale set for this weekend
text: Print this article Advertisement DAYTON — The Dayton Friends of the Library Fall Book Sale will be 9 a.m.-3 p.m. Saturday and noon-3 p.m. Sunday in the Delany Memorial Room at Dayton Memorial Library, 111 S. Third Street. There will be many children’s books available. Proceeds will go to support the library through purchases of books, magazine subscriptions, computers, furniture and youth and summer reading programs. For more information call 509-382-4131.
